name: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing mix of crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese, tossed in olive oil and oregano.

name: Hummus with Pita
description: Creamy chickpea hummus served with warm, fluffy pita bread.

name: Falafel Platter
description: Crispy falafel balls served with tahini sauce, pickles, and pita bread.

name: Chicken Souvlaki
description: Grilled chicken skewers marinated with Mediterranean spices, served with rice and tzatziki sauce.

name: Spanakopita
description: Flaky phyllo pastry filled with spinach, feta cheese, and herbs.

name: Moussaka
description: Layers of eggplant, minced meat, and creamy b√©chamel sauce, baked to perfection.

name: Baklava
description: A rich, sweet dessert made with layers of phyllo dough, nuts, and honey syrup.

name: Tzatziki Dip
description: A creamy yogurt and cucumber dip with a hint of garlic and dill.

name: Dolma
description: Vine leaves stuffed with rice, pine nuts, and herbs.

name: Lamb Gyro Wrap
description: Juicy lamb slices wrapped in pita bread with lettuce, tomatoes, and tzatziki.

name: Shawarma Plate
description: Marinated chicken shawarma served with rice, hummus, and salad.

name: Fattoush Salad
description: A crunchy salad with fresh vegetables, fried pita chips, and a tangy sumac dressing.

name: Kebab Platter
description: An assortment of chicken, lamb, and beef kebabs served with rice and grilled vegetables.

name: Tabbouleh
description: A fresh parsley salad with bulgur, tomatoes, onions, and a lemony dressing.

name: Grilled Halloumi
description: Slices of halloumi cheese grilled to perfection, served with a side of salad.

name: Stuffed Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with rice, vegetables, and Mediterranean spices.

name: Lentil Soup
description: A hearty soup made with red lentils, vegetables, and Mediterranean spices.

name: Za'atar Bread
description: Freshly baked bread topped with a blend of za'atar spices and olive oil.

name: Baba Ganoush
description: Smoky eggplant dip served with warm pita bread.

name: Rose Milk Pudding
description: A creamy dessert infused with rose water and topped with pistachios.
